name: Janet Peppermint Face Wash
description: Pimples out face wash is a Fast-acting treatment for Acne & Pimples.It Effectively controls & soothes Acne, Rashes & problematic skin conditions without excessive dryness. It's suitable for those with oily, pimple prone skin. Ingredients are Peppermint, Clove, Eucalyptus and Camphor.*Images for illustration purpose only. Product received may vary.
